div.p: The transition to a new website is underway. We will continue working on the new format over the next few months. Here you will find regular updates on current news, your forms and documents, and upcoming events. We hope you will find the upgrades make the website quicker and easier to use - whether it is on your phone, tablet, or laptop.
Superintendent Blog Click on the button to the left to check out Mr. Kurz's recent updates.

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

div.p: The Wall of Fame is a website containing information about our current El Paso Gridley athletics along with any available history of both El Paso High School and Gridley High School athletics.
